column3: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday October 14 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: 4:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. - 3 lanes inbound / 1 lane outbound.

Alumni Dr is ONE WAY from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.
